snippet: President Hamid Karzai said he respected Parliament’s decision to fire two senior security officials, but it was not clear how quickly he would replace them.
abstract: Afghan Pres Hamid Karzai moves confirms Parliament's decision to fire two senior security officials, Defense Min Abdul Rahim Wardak and Interior Min Bismillah Khan Mohammadi, but it is not clear how quickly he will replace them.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and SANGAR RAHIMI

lead_paragraph: President Hamid Karzai said he respected Parliament’s decision to fire two senior security officials, but it was not clear how quickly he would replace them.

headline.seo: Karzai Says Afghan Ministers to Be Replaced
headline.main: Afghan President Moves to Reassure Allies After Security Ministers Are Dismissed
headline.print_headline: Afghan President Moves to Reassure Allies After Security Ministers Are Dismissed
